posts.title: Petrol, diesel prices today: Rates constant on 26 November, check here what you need to pay in your city
posts.desc: Petrol and diesel prices on 26 November 2021: Petrol price in Delhi stands at Rs 103.97 per litre while diesel is available for Rs 86.67. In Mumbai, petrol is retailing at Rs 109.98 while diesel costs Rs 94.14

posts.title: Strong demand, rising vaccination rate drive positive outlook for Indian corporates: Moody's
posts.desc: In a report, the rating agency said credit fundamentals are favourable for India's companies on a sustained economic recovery and earnings of rated companies' will rise on strong consumer demand and high commodity prices

posts.title: Cryptocurrency won't be legal tender by any means, says finance secretary TV Somanathan
posts.desc: Somanathan's remarks come amid the backdrop of the Centre's decision to bring a bill in the Winter Session of Parliament to regulate cryptocurrency and a crash in prices of some popular cryptocurrencies

posts.title: Market Roundup: Sensex rises by 454 points, Nifty ends at 17,536; check top winners and losers here
posts.desc: Under sectoral indices, auto registered losses while metal, realty, media and IT were in green

posts.title: Rupee slips 15 paise to 74.55 against US dollar in early trade
posts.desc: On the domestic equity market front, the 30-share Sensex was trading 15.74 points or 0.03 percent lower at 58,325.25, while the broader NSE Nifty declined 30.10 points or 0.17 percent to 17,384.95

posts.title: Go Fashion IPO share allotment expected today; follow these steps to check allotment status
posts.desc: The Rs 1,013.6 crore Initial Public Offering IPO of the company was subscribed 135 times.

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of 24-carat gold sold at Rs 47,620, silver reaches Rs 62,600 per kg
posts.desc: The price of 10 grams of 22-carat gold in the national capital, New Delhi, and the financial capital, Mumbai, has reached Rs 46,840 and Rs 46,620 respectively

posts.title: Market Roundup : Sensex falls by 323 points, Nifty ends at 17,415; check top winners and losers here
posts.desc: The top BSE gainers were Kotak Bank, NTPC, ICICI Bank, Bajaj Finance and Power Grid. The top losers were Maruti, Infosys, ITC, Reliance and L&T

posts.title: WazirX restored, huge panic selling led cryptocurrency exchange app's crash, says CEO Nischal Shetty
posts.desc: Taking to his Twitter handle, Shetty addressed the new incoming legislation with a hashtag reading #Indiawantscrypto.

posts.title: Rupee slips 12 paise to 74.54 against US dollar in early trade
posts.desc: The dollar index rose by 0.06 percent to 96.55 and global oil benchmark Brent crude futures declined 0.07 percent to USD 82.25 per barrel

posts.title: 'Not a ban': Centre regulating cryptocurrency to check role in 'hawala', terror funding, say sources
posts.desc: As markets and experts speculate on the consequences of Centre’s move to bring a bill to regulate cryptocurrency, sources in the security establishment told CNN-News18 that the regulation will not be an outright ban

posts.title: Cryptocurrency update: Bitcoin, Dogecoin, Shibu Ina witness decline in value; Ether rises
posts.desc: Ethereum rose by 1.69 percent in value to $4,242.75. The second-largest digital token has risen by 2.07 percent in the last seven days

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of 24-carat gold at Rs 47,980, silver trades at Rs 62,700 per kg
posts.desc: As per the recent Multi Commodity Exchange data, the value of gold futures rose by 0.33 percent to Rs 47,592.00 and silver futures witnessed a rise of 0.26 percent to Rs 62,671.00

posts.title: Centre to introduce cryptocurrency regulation bill in Winter Session: All you need to know about proposed legislation
posts.desc: Prices of major cryptocurrencies saw a fall of around 15% or more, with Bitcoin down by around 18.53%

posts.title: Petrol, diesel prices today: Rates constant on 24 November, check here what you need to pay in your city
posts.desc: Petrol and diesel prices on 24 November 2021: Petrol price in Delhi stands at Rs 103.97 per litre while diesel is available for Rs 86.67. In Mumbai, petrol is retailing at Rs 109.98 while diesel costs Rs 94.14

posts.title: Centre releases Rs 95,082-cr to states as November tax devolution, says finance ministry
posts.desc: The increased amount of devolution in November is an advance release, and final adjustments will be made in March 2022

posts.title: Market Roundup : Sensex rises by 198 points, Nifty ends at 17,503; check top winners and losers here
posts.desc: . Broader markets outperformed, with BSE Midcap rising by 1.61 percent to 25,646.47 and BSE Smallcap gaining 1.81 percent to end at 28,450.31. India VIX rose by 2.82 percent to end at 18.02 levels

posts.title: Supreme Court defers hearing in Amazon-Future group case to 8 December over 'bulky documents'
posts.desc: The dispute between the two firms dates back to 2019 when the American retailer had made an investment in one of the Future group firms – Future Coupons Pvt Ltd

posts.title: Rupee slips 16 paise to 74.55 against US dollar in early trade
posts.desc: The dollar index rose by 0.01 percent to 96.55 and the global oil benchmark Brent crude futures declined 0.45 percent to USD 79.34 per barrel

posts.title: Cryptocurrency update: Bitcoin decline in value while Solana and Cardano rise
posts.desc: Bitcoin was priced at $56,894.01 at 9:45 this morning, witnessing a fall of 0.88 percent in the last 24 hours. The currency has seen a fall of 6.14 percent in the last seven days
